policyValidationMessages.MAX_LENGTH: Cannot be more than %{maxLength} characters long
policyValidationMessages.PASSWORD_CONFIRM: Password must be the same as your new password
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_LOWERCASE_LETTERS: Must have at least 1 lower case letter (3 out of 4 categories)
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_UPPERCASE_LETTERS: Must have at least 1 capital letter (3 out of 4 categories)
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_DIGITS: Must have at least 1 number (3 out of 4 categories)
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_SPECIAL: Must have at least 1 special character eg: !, @, $, etc (3 out of 4 categories)
policyValidationMessages.ENUM_VALUE: Must be one of the following values: %{allowedValues}
